svg.title: Security Architecture
svg.desc: Shows the four security layers of the Advanced Runtime

color: rgb(230, 81, 0) !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;
color: rgb(230, 81, 0) !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: Evolution Pipeline\nPropose → simulate → compare\n→ stage → promote / rollback

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
color: rgb(0, 77, 64) !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Proof Chain
HMAC-SHA256 signed
append-only log
Export / import / verify

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
color: rgb(136, 14, 79) !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Threat Detector
Prompt injection
Privilege escalation
6 threat categories

div.style: color: rgb(136, 14, 79) !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: Collusion Detector\nAgent interaction rings\nFrequency + timing analysis

div.style: color: rgb(136, 14, 79) !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: Memory Quorum\n2/3 vote threshold\nfor critical writes
